title: 30XX - Official Nintendo Switch Release Date Trailer
description: 30XX is a side-scrolling action rogue-like platformer developed by Batterystaple Games. Players will explore vibrant and dynamic worlds filled with intense combat and precise platforming. Defeat evil Guardians by mastering unique abilities and uncover what was once lost. Players can go at it alone or in local couch co-op with a friend along with playing in the Standard Mode offering a classic roguelite style or have endless lives with the permadeath-free Mega Mode. 30XX is available now on PC with a release on Nintendo Switch in North America on September 1, September 12 in Europe, and September 28 in Japan.

title: Armored Core 6: Fires of Rubicon - Official Accolades Trailer
description:
Watch the latest trailer for Armored Core VI: Fires of Rubicon to see what some critics are saying about this mech action game.

Armored Core VI: Fires of Rubicon is available now on PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, and PC.

#IGN #Gaming #ArmoredCore6

title: Ahsoka - Official 'Woo!' Clip (2023) Rosario Dawson, Natasha Liu Bordizzo
description:
Watch the latest clip from Ahsoka to see a thrilling space battle. The Disney+ Star Wars show stars Rosario Dawson, Natasha Liu Bordizzo, Mary Elizabeth Winstead, Wes Chatham, Lars Mikkelsen, Ray Stevenson, Eman Esfandi, Diana Lee Inosanto, and more. The series is created by Dave Filoni and directed by Dave Filoni, Steph Green, Peter Ramsey, Jennifer Getzinger, Geeta Vasant Patel, and Rick Famuyiwa. Its executive producers are Jon Favreau, Kathleen Kennedy, Colin Wilson, Dave Filoni, and Carrie Beck.

Episode 3 of Ahsoka is streaming on Disney+ at 6 PM PT.

title: Europa - Official Demo Trailer | gamescom 2023
description:
Take a tour of the gorgeous locations of Europa in this latest trailer for the upcoming adventure game. On the moon Europa, a lush terraformed paradise in Jupiter’s shadow, an android named Zee sets out in search of answers. Run, glide and fly across the landscape, solve mysteries in the ruins of a fallen utopia, and discover the story of Zee’s creator--the last human alive.

Europa will be available on Steam in 2024, and a demo for the game is available now on Steam.

#IGN #Gaming

title: LAURA BAILEY (30-second talk show) #gaming #straygods #laurabailey #thelastofus #30secondtalkshow
Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl 2 - Official Plankton Overview Trailer
description:
Watch the latest trailer for Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl 2 to see Plankton and his mech in action, including a breakdown of the character's abilities, playstyle, and more in the upcoming fighting game. 

Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl 2 will be available on Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S, and PC.

title: Dead by Daylight - Official Alien Launch Trailer
description: The Alien franchise has finally made its way to Dead by Daylight. Players can stalk Survivors as the Xenomorph or survive as Ellen Ripley, the ultimate hero. The Nostromo Wreckage is also available as a new map for the game from the classic Ridley Scott film. The Alien Collection is also available bringing new Outfits to the game like the Xenomorph Queen, Grid Xenomorph, and Xenomorph Clone Outfits for The Xenomorph and the Back in Action and Ripley 8 Outfits for Ellen Ripley. The Alien Franchise is available now for Dead by Daylight.

title: Skull Island: Rise of Kong - Official Release Date Trailer
description:
Skull Island: Rise of Kong will be available on PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, and PC via Steam on October 17, 2023. Get another at Skull Island: Rise of Kong in this trailer for the upcoming third-person action-adventure game.

In Skull Island: Rise of Kong, embark on a quest to avenge the death of Kong’s parents at the hands of the ultimate alpha predator: the saurian terror Gaw. Traverse the mysterious island and uncover its secrets across a variety of treacherous environments, discovering the power coursing through its exotic flora and fauna. Conquer waves of primal beasts, defeat unique bosses, and rise above all who stand in Kong’s way to being King.

#IGN #Gaming #KingKong

title: Skull & Bones Beta Preview: Yes, We Really, Finally, Actually Played This Game
description:
Yes, it's finally happening! With a much more interesting story than I was expecting, some really appetizing RPG systems in place, and smooth and entertaining naval combat, Skull & Bones is looking pretty darn fun as it prepares to finally set sail at long last. Check out our preview impressions from Travis Northup.

#IGN #Gaming #SkullAndBones

title: Daymare: 1994 Sandcastle - Official Launch Trailer
description:
Daymare: 1994 Sandcastle is a third-person narrative-driven story horror prequel game developed by Invader Studios. Players will embody agent Dalila Reyes, a former government spy now in the service of H.A.D.E.S. unit. Fight through nightmares come to life and uncover the truth of a mysterious incident within the walls of a top-secret military base. Daymare: 1994 Sandcastle is coming to PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series S|X, and PC on August 30.

#IGN #Gaming

title: Sonic Superstars Is 2.5D Sonic That’s Better With Friends
description:
Sonic Superstars sprints over well-trodden ground, which is all fine and dandy. But bringing friends along helps liven things up. Check out our hands-on preview impressions from Leanne Butkovic.

#IGN #Gaming #Sonic

title: Jagged Alliance 3 - Official Console Announcement Trailer
description:
Jagged Alliance 3 is a strategy tactical turn-based RPG developed by Haemimont Games. Players will fight back against the Legion who has seized control of the country of Grand Chien after it's been thrown into chaos and the president goes missing. Meet interesting characters and hire mercs from a large cast of unique soldiers with some returning as familiar fan favorites. Loot, salvage, and customize an arsenal of weaponry and equipment within the campaign either alone or with friends in online co-op. Jagged Alliance 3 is coming soon to PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, and Xbox Series S|X.

#IGN #Gaming #JaggedAlliance3

title: The Killer - Official Teaser Trailer (2023) Michael Fassbender, Charles Parnell
description:
Check out the teaser trailer for The Killer, an upcoming movie starring Michael Fassbender, Charles Parnell, Arliss Howard, Sophie Charlotte, and Tilda Swinton. After a fateful near-miss an assassin battles his employers, and himself, on an international manhunt he insists isn't personal.

The Killer's screenplay is by Andrew Kevin Walker, based on the graphic novel series "The Killer" written by Alexis Nolent (a.k.a Matz) and illustrated by Luc Jacamon, originally published in the French language by Editions Casterman. It is produced by Ceán Chaffin. 

The Killer, directed by David Fincher, opens in select theaters this October, and will be available on Netflix on November 10, 2023.

#IGN #Movies #TheKiller

title: Lords of the Fallen: A Breakdown of the Three Schools of Magic | IGN First
description:
You'll have access to three completely unique forms of magic in Lords of the Fallen: Rhogar, Radiant, and Umbral. Here's a breakdown of each one and why you may want to specialize in one, the other, or perhaps even all three.

#IGN #Gaming

title: Mercy Road - Exclusive Trailer (2023) Luke Bracey, Toby Jones
description:
In director John Curran's thriller Mercy Road, Luke Bracey (Elvis, Point Break) plays a flawed everyday man who commits a crime and soon learns how far he is willing to go to save his child. Toby Jones (Captain America: The Winter Soldier) plays the villain.

#IGN #Movies

title: Trine 5: A Clockwork Conspiracy Review
description:
Trine 5: A Clockwork Conspiracy reviewed by Travis Northup on PlayStation 5. Also available on Xbox Series X/S, PC, and Nintendo Switch.

Trine 5: A Clockwork Conspiracy is an awesome sequel that keeps the good times rolling for one of the best co-op puzzle-platformer series out there. This set of puzzles are some of the strongest they’ve ever been, and boss fights are creative and original – even if those highlights are occasionally cut short with snooze-inducing combat sections and a predictable story. It may not do much to innovate beyond what we’ve done four times before, but Trine 5 plays to its strengths extremely well and makes some important tweaks here and there that definitely make it worthy of a playthrough or two.

#IGN #Gaming

title: New Arc Line - Official Announcement Trailer
description:
Introducing New Arc Line, a new fantasy steampunk CRPG in which you play an immigrant to the bustling city of New Arc and find yourself quickly entangled in a fight that could decide the fate of the world. New Arc Line is due out in 2024 for PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X|S.

#IGN #Gaming

title: Congrats to Pockyy Neko Cosplay's Valkyrie from Apex Legends! #gamescom2023 #cosplay #apexlegends
NBA 2K24 - Official MyTEAM Trailer
description:
NBA 2K24 is introducing new changes and features to well regarded MyTEAM mode. The MyTEAM mode will come packed with a new Player Market, a new Salary Cap mode, Coach Boosts, MTP Upgrades, and more. Check out the trailer to get the full rundown on the MyTEAM Mode for NBA 2K24 launching on September 8 for PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series S|X, Nintendo Switch, and PC.

#IGN #Gaming #NBA

title: The Fabulous Fear Machine - Official Release Date Trailer
description: Enjoy the release date trailer for the upcoming horror strategy game The Fabulous Fear Machine, narrated by the game's protagonist, Jen Hammond. The Fabulous Fear Machine will launch on PC (via Steam, Epic Games Store, and GOG) on October 4, and a playable demo is available now on Steam as part of Strategy Fest.

title: Mortal Kombat 1 - Official Live Action Trailer (ft. Dave Bautista)
description:
Check out the fun new Mortal Kombat 1 trailer featuring star Dave Bautista. Mortal Kombat 1 will be available on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X/S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store) beginning on September 14, 2023.

It's In Our Blood. Discover a reborn Mortal Kombat Universe created by Fire God Liu Kang. Mortal Kombat 1 ushers in a new era of the iconic franchise with a new fighting system, game modes, and Fatalities.

#IGN #Gaming #MortalKombat

title: RIP Arleen Sorkin, the inspiration and voice of Harley Quinn #rip #arleensorkin #harleyquinn #dc
When EXACTLY Can We Expect GTA 6 To Release? - IGN Daily Fix
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Take-Two's CEO dropped a potential hint as to when we can expect Grand Theft Auto 6. In keeping with recent reports that the company is expecting a very big 2024-2025, CEO Strauss Zelnick also stated that the company has some big titles lined up from their various labels, and that Fiscal Year 2025 (which begins in the second of of 2024) is going to be huge. In other news, Analogue's popular Pocket handheld gaming device is getting a new model: glow-in-the-dark green. And yes, it actually does glow in the dark. Unfortunately it'll be super limited, so try and get your preorder in when it goes on sale this Friday. This episode is brought to you buy Universal Orlando Resort.

#ign

title: The Old Republic Gets Synopsis as Disney Organizes Its Star Wars Eras - IGN The Fix: Entertainment
description: Disney has updated its Star Wars website with a comprehensive list of eras, summing up where each of its tv shows and movies fit within the  timeline, and a brief, two-sentence synopsis of The Old Republic era there is giving fans a lot to chew over, especially you #KOTOR #StarWars die-hards. The synopsis largely keeps intact the broad strokes of what happens during The Old Republic era of Legends canon made famous by BioWare’s Knights of the Old Republic and The Old Republic, which take place 4,000 years before the Galactic Empire. Gran Turismo surprises at the box office, and The Spiderwick Chronicles was ready to air its 8-episodes on Disney Plus until the company decided to reevaluate its streaming strategies.

title: Sea of Stars Review
description:
Sea of Stars reviewed on PlayStation 5 by Gabriel Moss. Also available on PlayStation 4, Xbox, PC, and Switch.

Sea of Stars is an excellent tribute RPG that channels the best parts of its ‘90s-era forebears like Chrono Trigger, Final Fantasy 6, and even Star Ocean: The Second Story. Because of that, it’s fair to say that its world, graphical style, and mechanics aren’t wholly original, but there are enough interesting twists in its 30-hour story to make for a rich and enjoyable experience of its own merit. This isn’t just nostalgia fodder. That said, its twitchy combat can be difficult to get a handle on, and once you do, it only stays interesting for so long before its limited customization options make it start to feel just a little repetitive. That’s made up for by a strong soundtrack, an approachable and endearing story, and a wide number of fun zones and boss fights that make this a trip worth taking.

#IGN #Gaming
